title: Whenever I post a reply, the forum glitches out until I refresh again
body: Whenever I reply to a thread, after the page loads all I see is the original post. The rest of the thread doesn't appear and the navigation buttons are broken.  refreshing the page fixes this, but it's really annoying.

replies.body: Huh....that's pretty weird tbh. I wonder if this has something to do with the browser you're using (since I've never personally had this type of problem from my end). Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or possibly using a different browser and let me know if that helps or not.
